I am a cloud engineer experienced in leveraging software development skills to build highly resilient, cloud-based solutions and to automate manual processes, decreasing total time to complete tasks by up to 93%. I'm passionate about the cloud, clean code, automated testing, and anything DevOps.

Experience

Associate IT Programmer Analyst, Cloud Infrastucture Team

NextEra Energy
  • Spearheaded a team of three to automate the provisioning of AWS WorkSpaces for new hires, allowing customers to provision virtual desktops on both AWS and on-premises infrastructure as fast as 30 minutes. Reduced time to deliver product down from 3 days to less than 5 hours.
  • Utilized python, selenium, and test-driven development to automate the entry of application metadata into AWS RDS databases. Reduced time to complete data entry task from 4 hours to 15 minutes.
  • Worked closely with cloud developers to troubleshoot issues and fulfill service requests in compliance with service SLAs.
  • Regularly communicated with users, software development teams, and IT leaders to collect product requirements and release new versions in a fast-paced and agile-based development cycle.
  • Collaborated with teams to understand their roles and identify issues and other opportunities for creative problem solving.

NextEra Energy

Interests

At work, I'm always looking to improve our AWS environment for our end users, often reaching out to developers and support teams directly to gain their perspectives and look for opportunities for new and creative solutions.

Outside of work, my hobbies include staying fit through running, experimenting with new recipes in the kitchen, and doing the occasional odd-ball sport here and there. Any remaining time I have goes towards family and friends, and honing my technical skills through personal projects and studying for certifications.
